text: Yehor Shalfeyev (; born 3 October 1998) is a professional Ukrainian football midfielder who currently plays for Metalurh Zaporizhya on loan from Zorya Luhansk in the Ukrainian First League. ==Career== Shalfeyev is a product of the Metalurh Zaporizhia Youth Sportive School System. He made his debut as a substituted player in a second half-time for FC Zorya Luhansk in the losing match against FC Dynamo Kyiv on 7 April 2018 in the Ukrainian Premier League. == References == ==External links== *Profile at Footballfacts (Rus) * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Zaporizhia Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:FC Zorya Luhansk players Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Yehor Shalfeyev
